languages.text: {n}Медикарий сжимает кулаки и, скрипя зубами, говорит:{/n} "Этому не бывать! Проклятые духи лгут тебе! Они желают сбить меня с пути, как и любого истово верующего человека. Заглуши их речи молитвой и не дай им творить зло через тебя!"

{n}Marius clenches his fists, gnashes his teeth, and says,{/n} "That will never be! The cursed spirits are lying to you! They seek to lead me astray, as they do any fervent believer. Drown out their voices with prayer and don't let them make you an instrument of their evil!"
languages.original_text: {n}Медикарий сжимает кулаки и, скрипя зубами, говорит:{/n} "Этому не бывать! Проклятые духи лгут тебе! Они желают сбить меня с пути, как и любого истово верующего человека. Заглуши их речи молитвой и не дай им творить зло через тебя!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The medicae officer clenches his fists, gnashes his teeth, and says,{/n} "That will never be! The warp spirits are lying to you! They seek to lead me astray, as they do with any fervent believer. Drown out their voices with prayer and don't let them make you an instrument of their evil!"

{n}The medicae officer clenches his fists, gnashes his teeth, and says,{/n} "That will never be! The warp spirits are lying to you! They seek to lead me astray, as they do with any fervent believer. Drown out their voices with prayer and don't let them make you an instrument of their evil!"

{n}The medicae officer clenches his fists, gnashes his teeth, and says,{/n} "That will never be! The warp spirits are lying to you! They seek to lead me astray, as they do any fervent believer. Drown out their voices with prayer and don't let them make you an instrument of their evil!"

{n}The medicae officer clenches his fists, gnashes his teeth, and says,{/n} "That will never be! The warp spirits are lying to you! They seek to lead me astray, as they do any fervent believer. Drown out their voices with prayer and don't let them make you an instrument of their evil!"

{n}Marius clenches his fists, gnashes his teeth, and says,{/n} "That will never be! The cursed spirits are lying to you! They seek to lead me astray, as they do any fervent believer. Drown out their voices with prayer and don't let them make you an instrument of their evil!"

{n}Marius clenches his fists, gnashes his teeth, and says,{/n} "That will never be! The cursed spirits are lying to you! They seek to lead me astray, as they do any fervent believer. Drown out their voices with prayer and don't let them make you an instrument of their evil!"

languages.text: {n}Marius serre les poings et les dents, puis s'exclame :{/n} « C'est tout bonnement inconcevable ! Les esprits maudits vous mentent ! Ils cherchent à me détourner de ma vocation, comme ils le font avec tous les fervents croyants. Noyez leurs voix sous vos prières et ne les laissez plus faire de vous un instrument de leur infamie ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Marius clenches his fists, gnashes his teeth, and says,{/n} "That will never be! The cursed spirits are lying to you! They seek to lead me astray, as they do any fervent believer. Drown out their voices with prayer and don't let them make you an instrument of their evil!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marius serre les poings et les dents, puis s'exclame :{/n} « C'est tout bonnement inconcevable ! Les esprits du Warp vous mentent ! Ils cherchent à me détourner de ma vocation, comme ils le font avec tous les fervents croyants. Noyez leurs voix sous vos prières et ne les laissez plus faire de vous un instrument de leur infamie ! »

languages.text: {n}Marius cierra los puños con fuerza y responde con los dientes apretados:{/n} «¡Eso nunca ocurrirá! ¡Los espíritus malditos le mienten! Pretenden desviarme por el mal camino, como hacen con todos los creyentes devotos. ¡Ahogue sus voces con oraciones y no deje que le conviertan en un instrumento de su maldad!».
languages.original_text: {n}Marius clenches his fists, gnashes his teeth, and says,{/n} "That will never be! The cursed spirits are lying to you! They seek to lead me astray, as they do any fervent believer. Drown out their voices with prayer and don't let them make you an instrument of their evil!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marius cierra los puños con fuerza y responde con los dientes apretados:{/n} «¡Eso nunca ocurrirá! ¡Los espíritus de la disformidad le mienten! Pretenden desviarme por el mal camino, como hacen con todos los creyentes devotos. ¡Ahogue sus voces con oraciones y no deje que le conviertan en un instrumento de su maldad!».

languages.text: {n}马吕斯握紧双拳，咬牙切齿道：{/n}“绝不可能！这一定是该死的恶灵在欺骗您！他们想把我引入歧途，他们不希望任何虔诚的信徒踏上信仰之道。快祈祷吧，用祈祷淹没他们的声音，不要让他们把您变成邪恶的工具！”
languages.original_text: {n}Marius clenches his fists, gnashes his teeth, and says,{/n} "That will never be! The cursed spirits are lying to you! They seek to lead me astray, as they do any fervent believer. Drown out their voices with prayer and don't let them make you an instrument of their evil!"

traits.locale_text: {n}马吕斯握紧双拳，咬牙切齿道：{/n}“绝不可能！这一定是亚空间的恶灵在欺骗你！他们想把我引入歧途，他们不希望任何虔诚的信徒踏上信仰之道。快祈祷吧，用祈祷淹没他们的声音，不要让他们把你变成邪恶的工具！”

languages.text: {n}マリウスは拳を握りしめ、歯を食いしばり、言った。{/n}「それは起こらない！呪われた精霊たちは嘘をついている！熱烈な信者がそうであるように、彼らは私を迷わせようとしているんです。祈りで彼らの声をかき消し、あなたを彼らの悪に利用させないでください！」
languages.original_text: {n}Marius clenches his fists, gnashes his teeth, and says,{/n} "That will never be! The cursed spirits are lying to you! They seek to lead me astray, as they do any fervent believer. Drown out their voices with prayer and don't let them make you an instrument of their evil!"

traits.locale_text: {n}マリウスは拳を握りしめ、歯を食いしばり、言った。{/n}「それは起こらない！ワープスピリットたちは嘘をついている！熱烈な信者がそうであるように、彼らは私を迷わせようとしているんです。祈りで彼らの声をかき消し、あなたを彼らの悪に利用させないでください！」

languages.text: {n}Marius ballt die Fäuste, knirscht mit den Zähnen und sagt:{/n} "Das wird niemals sein! Die verfluchten Geister belügen Euch! Sie wollen mich auf den falschen Weg führen, wie jeden inbrünstig Gläubigen. Übertönt ihre Stimmen durch Gebete und lasst Euch von ihnen nicht zu einem Werkzeug des Bösen machen!"
languages.original_text: {n}Marius clenches his fists, gnashes his teeth, and says,{/n} "That will never be! The cursed spirits are lying to you! They seek to lead me astray, as they do any fervent believer. Drown out their voices with prayer and don't let them make you an instrument of their evil!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marius ballt die Fäuste, knirscht mit den Zähnen und sagt:{/n} "Das wird niemals sein! Die Warp-Geister belügen Euch! Sie wollen mich auf den falschen Weg führen, wie jeden inbrünstig Gläubigen. Übertönt ihre Stimmen durch Gebete und lasst Euch von ihnen nicht zu einem Werkzeug des Bösen machen!"

languages.text: {n}Marius yumruklarını sıkarak ve dişlerini gıcırdatarak konuşuyor.{/n} "Böyle bir şey asla olmayacak! Lanetli ruhlar sana yalan söylüyor! Beni yolumdan döndürmeye çalışıyorlar. Tıpkı gayretli tüm inananlara yaptıkları gibi. Onların seslerini dualarla sustur ve seni kötülüğün maşası hâline getirmelerine izin verme!"
languages.original_text: {n}Marius clenches his fists, gnashes his teeth, and says,{/n} "That will never be! The cursed spirits are lying to you! They seek to lead me astray, as they do any fervent believer. Drown out their voices with prayer and don't let them make you an instrument of their evil!"
